articles.title: The FDA is expected to authorize 2nd boosters for people 50 and up
articles.description: People aged 50 and over could soon be eligible for a second Pfizer-BioNTech or Moderna COVID vaccine booster. The administration wants to offer the shots as immunity from the first booster is waning.
